page.shortlink: dt email Integrated Email HTML Editor
page.description: Alpha Anywhere makes it possible for you to compose emails in plain text and HTML formats. The Email Editor incorporates the HTML Editor that is separately available as a utility within Alpha Anywhere.

section.description: As you can see in the picture below, there is free control over text fonts, styles, and colors. As with other HTML editors, you can embed images and tables. You can control alignment, indents, numbering, and bulleting on a paragraph by paragraph basis. Within tables, you can define cell properties, such as horizontal and vertical alignment, and width and height in pixels or as a percentage of table width. You can also control table properties such as Cellpadding, cellspacing, border thickness, table alignment, and table width in pixels or as a percentage of page width.
